channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD

item.title: Report E-2024050143
item.description:
Report E-2024050143

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-10T15:12:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-09
  • City: ELKRIDGE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While unloading pallet of bags from rack with forklift, forklift operator struck two bags slightly ripping them open and contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was swept up and placed in to a recovery container. The ripped bags were taped up and placed in to a recovery container and shipped to ultimate consignee without further incident.

item.title: Report X-2024050242
item.description:
Report X-2024050242

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-09T15:13:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-03
  • City: CROFTON
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 3rd a package was discovered leaking during the PM sort. The package contained UN1263 Paint Related Material,3, PGIII. The package was contained into a steel salvage drum and is being sent out for disposal.
